query.text: Generate a daily investment briefing with current stock data (AAPL, TSLA, GOOGL, NVDA, top 3 movers), market sentiment analysis, and a 30-60 second audio narration summary. Provide the final briefing text and audio link, ready for sending via Slack.

title: Enchanted Forest: Visual Inspiration & Storybook Illustration

query.text: Search for enchanted forest images on Unsplash with misty air and vibrant foliage, analyze the lighting and textures like soft moss and glowing fireflies, create a prompt for a fantasy forest scene with magical glowing trees, and generate this image for my storybook illustration.

title: Tech Guru Opinions to Smart Purchase Advice

query.text: I'm planning to buy a new phone and need expert opinions before deciding. Please find the 2 most recent and popular smartphone review videos from MKBHD and Mrwhosetheboss, provide their YouTube links, analyze each video's key points in detail, and recommend which phone I should consider purchasing based on what these tech reviewers have to say.
